医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
新发现揭示了一种罕见骨骼疾病的遗传基础麦吉尔领导的研究小组取得了一项重要发现，揭示了一种罕见骨骼疾病的遗传基础。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240119/New-discovery-sheds-light-on-the-genic-basis-of-a-rare-skeletal-disorder.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240119/New-discovery-sheds-light-on-the-genic-basis-of-a-rare-skeletal-disorder.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=dd5ba317-27d1-491c-9cd3-5f4916194ea4 Fri, 19 Jan 2024 11:11:50 -0500 New discovery sheds light on the genetic basis of a rare skeletal disorder
婴儿癫痫痉挛综合征转诊中发现的种族差异婴儿癫痫痉挛综合征 (IESS)，通常称为婴儿痉挛症，是婴儿期最常见的癫痫形式。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240119/Racial-disparity-identified-in-referral-for-infantile-epileptic-spasms-syndrome.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240119/Racial-disparity-identified-in-referral-for-infantile-epileptic-spasms-syndrome.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=643f0122-218d-4749-8d9e-fe3351437e35 Fri, 19 Jan 2024 11:09:17 -0500 Racial disparity identified in referral for infantile epileptic spasms syndrome
人工智能模型揭示记忆如何融合现实与想象伦敦大学学院研究人员的一项新研究表明，生成人工智能的最新进展有助于解释记忆如何使我们能够了解世界、重温旧经验并为想象力和规划构建全新的经验。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240119/AI-model-unveils-how-memories-blend-reality-and-imagination.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240119/AI-model-unveils-how-memories-blend-reality-and-imagination.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=736a1b5e-5b2a-450c-b4c2-cc052fd0148b Fri, 19 Jan 2024 09:48:00 -0500 AI model unveils how memories blend reality and imagination
细菌的“自杀式”免疫系统增强了抗生素对抗霍乱的功效细菌有一个免疫系统，可以保护它们免受称为噬菌体的病毒的侵害。来自蒂宾根大学和维尔茨堡大学的一个研究小组现在展示了这种免疫系统如何增强特定抗生素对抗霍乱病原体霍乱弧菌的效果。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240119/Bacterias-suicidal-immune-system-boosts-antibiotic-power-against-cholera.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240119/Bacterias-suicidal-immune-system-boosts-antibiotic-power-against-cholera.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f5f4d65c-ca58-4fd9-83c0-40b94d0e0c03 Fri, 19 Jan 2024 09:25:24 -0500 Bacteria's "suicidal" immune system boosts antibiotic power against cholera
数学模型开创了具有成本效益的早期糖尿病检测时代由于数学建模，简单的血液测试可以比复杂的测试表现得更好。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240119/Mathematical-model-ushers-in-era-of-cost-efficient-early-diabetes-detection.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240119/Mathematical-model-ushers-in-era-of-cost-efficient-early-diabetes-detection.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ca1c2d11-a96d-4b96-8f79-110ddbb768a8 Fri, 19 Jan 2024 09:13:36 -0500 Mathematical model ushers in era of cost-effective early diabetes detection
新研究挑战直肠检查在前列腺癌筛查中的作用维也纳综合癌症中心、维也纳医科大学和维也纳总医院的一项研究仔细研究了常见检查方法对早期发现前列腺癌的有效性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240119/New-study-challenges-role-of-rectal-exam-in-prostate-cancer-screening.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240119/New-study-challenges-role-of-rectal-exam-in-prostate-cancer-screening.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=16c535f5-5bf1-4e49-a609-bef184bdc2d5 Fri, 19 Jan 2024 09:07:20 -0500 New study challenges role of rectal exam in prostate cancer screening

评估单端口机器人辅助技术在保留乳头乳房切除术中的有效性和安全性研究人员评估了单孔（SP）机器人辅助方法进行保留乳头乳房切除术（NSM）的安全性和可行性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240119/Evaluating-the-efficientness-and-safety-of-single-port-robot-assistance-technique-in-nipple-sparing-mastection-procedures.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240119/Evaluating-the-efficientness-and-safety-of-single-port-robot-assistance-technique-in-nipple-sparing-mastection-procedures.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6414d512-98a4-4220-b7ad-6c505bd2288d Fri, 19 Jan 2024 08:36:00 -0500 Evaluating the effectiveness and safety of single-port robot-assisted technique in nipple-sparing mastectomy procedures

产前阿片类药物暴露与免疫相关疾病风险之间有何关联？研究人员比较了产前阿片类药物暴露和未接触过阿片类药物的儿童因免疫相关疾病住院和急诊的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240119/What-is-the-association- Between-prenatal-opioid-exposure-and-risk-of-immune-lated-conditions.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240119/What-is-the-association- Between-prenatal-opioid-exposure-and-risk-of-immune-lated-conditions.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2071dfe5-e721-45a6-afca-40bc4368a280 Fri, 19 Jan 2024 08:18:00 -0500 What is the association between prenatal opioid exposure and risk of immune-related conditions?
